testcase.name: mochacfg SidebarTest FR002, Home button response part I (SideBar component) Sidebar component is rendered correctly

testsuite.name: FR012: Search bar, response, part I (Sidebar component)

testcase.name: mochacfg SidebarTest FR012: Search bar, response, part I (Sidebar component) Search button is clickable

testsuite.name: FR002: Home button response part II (HomePage)

testcase.name: mochacfg HomePageTest FR002: Home button response part II (HomePage) Pressing home button redirects you to start page
testcase.classname: Pressing home button redirects you to start page

testcase.name: mochacfg HomePageTest FR007: Game picture pressed The button for a specific game shall when pressed redirect the user to that specific game’s page.
testcase.classname: The button for a specific game shall when pressed redirect the user to that specific game’s page.

testcase.name: mochacfg HomePageTest FR064: Filter The application shall, when the user presses a certain category, filter games on that specific category
testcase.classname: The application shall, when the user presses a certain category, filter games on that specific category

testsuite.name: FR012: Search bar, response part II (HomePage component)

testcase.name: mochacfg SearchPageTest FR012: Search bar, response part II (HomePage component) SearchPage is rendered when search bar is pressed
testcase.classname: SearchPage is rendered when search bar is pressed

testcase.name: mochacfg ChatAndInfoWindowTest FR062: Display chat ChatAndInfoWindow is rendered correctly
mochacfg ChatAndInfoWindowTest FR062: Display chat ChatAndInfoWindow should have a button for chat that displays the chat if pressed
testcase.classname: ChatAndInfoWindow should have a button for chat that displays the chat if pressed

testsuite.name: FR029: Purchase button, response part II (GameInfo)

testcase.name: mochacfg GameInfoTest FR029: Purchase button, response part II (GameInfo) Buy button in GameInfo redirects to Steam
testcase.classname: Buy button in GameInfo redirects to Steam

testcase.name: mochacfg GameInfoTest FR065: Display game info The user shall be able to access game information, if it is a steam game, by clicking the game info button.
testcase.classname: The user shall be able to access game information, if it is a steam game, by clicking the game info button.

testcase.classname: The GamePage component is rendered correctly

testcase.name: mochacfg GamePageTest FR024: Active stream on game page, part I (GamePage component) The GamePage contains relevant components

testsuite.name: FR029: Purchase button, response part I (GamePage)

testcase.name: mochacfg GamePageTest FR029: Purchase button, response part I (GamePage) ChatAndInfoWindow should display GameInfo if a steamId exist
testcase.classname: ChatAndInfoWindow should display GameInfo if a steamId exist

testcase.name: mochacfg ThumbnailTest FR056: Switch streams The application shall when the user selects an optional stream play that selected stream
testcase.classname: The application shall when the user selects an optional stream play that selected stream
